snippet.title: Conformity | itch.io 2019 Trailer | PC
snippet.description:
Play Conformity on: https://ordnas.itch.io/conformity

Conformity is a first-person horror video game created and developed by Alessandro Capriolo. 

The majoritiy of the game is set in a abbandoned house, where the player needs to explore, check portraits and furniture to progress. Inanimate objects and ambient noises will be part of this small experience to contribute to the overall atmosphere. 

It is highly suggested to play the game with headphones.

FOLLOW CONFORMITY
If you liked this game please consider to like and follow me on:
Twitter https://twitter.com/CaprioloOrdnas
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Ordnas006
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/alessandrocapriolo/
